title: TVS Motor sales up 21 pc at 4,34,714 units in Oct
description: TVS Motor Company reported 21% increase in total dispatches, reaching 4,34,714 units in October, marking its highest-ever monthly sales. The company's two-wheeler sales surged by 22%, with domestic two-wheeler sales growing by 25%. The iQube electric scooter sales soared, and total exports also registered a significant growth of 6% in the same period.
